#summary Allows custom settings for each map.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Allows custom config files for each map. 

To use, create the folder `swarm/cfg/asw_mapconfigs/`. Then create a cfg file for the name of the map you would like to configure. For example, `asi-jac1-landingbay_01.cfg`. You can now place any custom settings for that map in this cfg file.

*NOTE:* It is recommended to place your settings in a file called `<mapname>_custom.cfg`. Otherwise, your settings will be overwritten in an update.
